history.content:
Interested in working with a start-up on a data analytics and machine learning project? Want to help teach high schoolers the fundamentals of data science?

 

Big Data at Berkeley is a new data science organization dedicated to spreading data science principles to students throughout the Bay Area. We have 2 teams--education and projects. Our education division leads a 9-week data science boot camp on campus for local high school students. Our projects division will be working on developing a cutting-edge data analytics project with an exciting, real-world client. 


Apply by 9/20 at 11:59PM at this link: http://bit.ly/bdabgeneralapp, or stop by our drop-in info sessions every day this week from 1-2PM at FSM if you would like to learn more! Please email bigdata.berkeley@gmail.com with any questions. We look forward to working with you!
history.subject: Data Science Consulting and Education | Big Data at Berkeley Recruitment
